posts.content:
http://www.classiccarauctions.co.uk/195 ... -campervan

59 samba from South Africa, looking at the photo's not sure about the paint work, have a look at the badge pic.

Apart from the obvious, i wonder if orig interior, paint colours etc

65DEVY wrote: http://www.classiccarauctions.co.uk/195 ... -campervan

59 samba from South Africa, looking at the photo's not sure about the paint work, have a look at the badge pic.

Apart from the obvious, i wonder if orig interior, paint colours etc
Some non standard additions
Safaries n duck
Alloy step
Westfalia rack
Mud flaps
Modern indicators under front bumper
Volkswagen scipt on tailgate is post 1963
Engine lid 1959 should have centre brake light?

No awning rail

M code details will answer

So confirmed
RHD
Has "Devonesque" interior fitted...
Does not look like original
Heater log tube not cut.
No alloy base plate
Rear seat base incorrect..cut to fit non relocated heater log..
Veneer crown cht not quarter sawn
Cooker cabinet on door..not correct style.. draw?
Shame. Looked ok

Has orange peel..
So excess paint
Have you seen the bus in person? Wondering where you got the detail as the link above is only showing me limited photos
There are 14 photos there Jim, click on the main one and you get a pop up with 14 pics...

This just in on the 59...
Interior isn't original to the bus BUT is an original 59 Devon interior, complete with tables, gas lamp (twin shade), stove, Easicool not osokool.
Painted in it's original colours, original factory safari's and lot's of NOS parts used.
Creative IRS with 1303 Beetle box, 68 Bay front ball joint/brakes. (wrong)
Period reversing lights for indicators.
Original Westy rack, but they only belong on Westy's IMO.
Most things on the snag list could be reversed.
All in all i think it's pretty special, just a few tweeks needed here and there, it could make an old Devon pervert very happy....

MarkFer wrote:There are 14 photos there Jim, click on the main one and you get a pop up with 14 pics...
Thanks, that didn't work from the phone!
Don't drive to quickly or brake too hard.... no clamps on the roof rack lol

Passed in at first auction, sold for 65k next time...
https://www.silverstoneauctions.com/195 ... mba-camper
